import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'avans-nx-workshop-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent {}

Welcome to the Recipe App!

Discover, share, and manage recipes. Explore collections curated by our users or create your own. Let’s make cooking fun and collaborative!

Explore Recipes My Recipes
